import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import AdminDashboardForAll from "../AdminDashboardForAll"; import {FaStar, FaBackward, FaArrowDown, FaPlus} from "react-icons/fa"; import axios from "axios"; const AddBook = () =>{ const [books, setBookValue] = useState({ bk_title: "", bk_author: "", bk_edition: "", bk_publisher: "", bk_publication_date: "", bk_copies: "", bk_category: "", bk_rack_no: "" }); // const { bk_title, username, email, phone, website } = user; const inputEvent = (event) =>{ setBookValue({ ...books, [event.target.name]: event.target.value }); } return( <>
Back To List

Add New Book

); } export default AddBook;
